dynamic_block_list_settings.description: Dynamic block list configurations containing either IP address or URL's

enabled.description: True, if user want this configuration to be active.

blocklistName.description: Name of the block list from source

blockListSource.description: The source URL or the local file path

blockListType.description: Either IP or URL block list type from source

blockListRegexType.description: Tells us type of source block-list input as TXT, CSV or custom regex to parse in list

interval.description: The polling interval in days, hours, minutes and seconds to fetch the block list from source.

enabled.description: True, if the polling is enabled for that configuration

dayOfWeek.description: The day of week to auto fetch the blocklist from source (0-6) (0 is Sunday 6 is Saturday)

hourOfDay.description: The hour of day to auto fetch the blocklist from source  (0-23)

minuteOfHour.description: The minute of hour to auto fetch the blocklist from source  (0-59)
